statement.name: INSERT_SMASCN
statement.desc: Inserci√≥n tabla de Secciones y Sedes

statement.name: UPDATE_SMASCN
statement.sql: UPDATE SMASCN SET CLRSCN=?,IDECIU=?,NOMSCN=?,NPQSCN=?,STDSCN=?,TPOSCN=? where IDESCN=? and CODCIA=?

statement.name: DELETE_SMASCN
statement.sql: DELETE SMASCN WHERE IDESCN=? and CODCIA =?
